text: Need Grace Young for Telstra campaign. Budget around $3,530, looking for 2 x Meet and greet, 2 x LinkedIn post, 3 x Instagram reel, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Facebook post. 8 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
